name: Recesky DIY Stereo Pinhole Camera Kit
description:
The Recesky DIY Stereo Pinhole Camera is another wonderful DIY (Do-It-Yourself) camera by Recesky that allows you to build a 3D stereo camera / panoramic camera / standard 35mm camera yourself. Yes, it is really three cameras in one! The Recesky DIY 3D Stereo Camera can take not only stereo images using 35mm film that can be viewed in 3D using stereo glasses, but also has a normal pinhole mode for regular sized pictures, as well as a panoramic mode for wide pictures that is twice the width of regular pictures! Like the Recesky DIY TLR camera, the Stereo Pinhole Camera kit comes with all the necessary parts in a neatly packaged box along with a 3D stereo viewer that lets you see your pictures in 3D. Assembling the camera allows you to understand how a pinhole camera works with a simple but smart bulb mode shutter. What impressed us even more is that there are 3 pinhole lenses - allowing you to switch between stereo, panoramic and standard shooting modes at anytime you wish, within the same roll of film! Recesky DIY Stereo Pinhole Camera Features:
  • 3x Pinhole Lenses used in 3 different ways for 3 shooting modes!
  • Bulb mode shutter, including hold function
  • Multiple Exposures
  • Takes 35mm film
Package includes:
  • Recesky DIY Stereo Pinhole Camera Kit
  • Recesky Stereo Viewer
  • Instruction manual in Chinese
Important note: The manufacturer has not yet made English instructions for this camera! We have prepared a step by step tutorial to guide you through the manual - check it out here: Recesky DIY Stereo Pinhole Tutorial. And as always, please feel free to drop us an email if you have any questions! Note: A standard small sized philips (cross shaped) screw driver is required to screw in the screws is not provided.

name: Recesky DIY TLR Twin Lens Reflex Camera Kit
description:
• Update: Check out our newly uploaded Recesky TLR tutorial/guide!
The Recesky DIY Twin Lens Reflex (TLR) Camera is a beautiful DIY (Do-It-Yourself) camera that represents everything that is lomo. We absolutely love the idea of a camera that not only takes great photos, but is also one that you get to build yourself! The Recesky DIY TLR camera comes with all the necessary parts in a neatly packaged box along with English instructions. Going through the process of assembling the camera is not only a joy in itself, but allows you to ultimately understand the exact function that every part ultimately plays in order to capture a photo - it truly is an amazing experience! The TLR stands for Twin Lens Reflex. There are two lenses - one for capturing the photo onto film, and the other that acts as as a viewfinder for framing the photo. The main advantage of this is that you can compose your shots from waist height! The Recesky is sometimes called the Gakkenflex clone, fake Gakkenflex or even Fakkenflex. The kits are almost entirely similar (even the instruction manuals!), however there are two notable differences: 1. The Recesky is slightly wider and 2. The Recesky allows you to focus. The first point is not so important, as it's not really that wide in the first place (the base measures about 6.3cm), however the second point does place the Recesky at an advantage in that you no longer have to guess how far to focus the lens. Recesky Features:
  • Aperture: f/11
  • Shutter speec: 1 / 125 second
  • Multiple Exposures
  • Focus adjustment range: 50cm to infinity
  • Takes 35mm film
Package includes:
  • Recesky DIY Twin Lens Reflex Camera Kit
  • Instruction manual in English and Chinese
Note: A standard small sized philips (cross shaped) screw driver is required to screw in the screws is not provided

name: Holga 120 N
description:
This is where the magic begins! The Holga 120 N is your entry ticket to the world of lomo photography. The Holga 120 N produces amazing distinctive photos - such as its signature vignetting around corners. Whether you are a casual photography enthusiast or a serious photographer wanting to test out the unique lomo effects this camera produces - one thing's for sure, this camera has something to offer everyone. It comes with all the goodies the Holga has to offer, such as:
  • Bulb setting - allows for extended shutter release, ideal for use when shooting at night time or with a tripod
  • multiple exposures - allows you to shoot many photos onto a single frame/picture!
  • two film masks that give you the option to shoot 12 frames or 16 frames on a roll of 120 film!
  • two aperture settings
  • hotshoe - allows you to attach a separate external flash! (Check out the Holga one!)
How you make use of these features to create your photos is only limited by your imagination and creativity! Package includes:
  • Brand new Holga 120 N camera
  • Film mask for 6 x 4.5cm shooting
  • Film mask for 6 x 6 cm shooting
  • Instruction manual
  • Camera strap

name: Holga 120 GCFN Camera (White)
description:
The Holga 120 GCFN sports a built-in Colour Flash, enabling you to shoot pictures with funky colour effects at your fingertips. Operating the Colour Flash is as easy as rotating the dial at the top of the camera. In addition to a normal white flash, red, blue and orange coloured flashes are also available at your disposal. An addition the GCFN has to the CFN is that it has a Glass Lens, which is where the 'G' comes from. In addition to the color flash, the Holga GCFN comes with all the goodies the Holga has to offer, such as:
  • Bulb setting - allows for extended shutter release, ideal for use when shooting at night time or with a tripod
  • multiple exposures - allows you to shoot many photos onto a single frame/picture!
  • two film masks that give you the option to shoot 12 frames or 16 frames on a roll of 120 film!
  • two aperture settings
How you make use of these features along with the colour flash to create your photos is only limited by your imagination and creativity!
  • Brand new Holga 120GCFN camera (White)
  • Film mask for 6 x 4.5cm shooting
  • Film mask for 6 x 6 cm shooting
  • Instruction manual
  • Camera strap
Note: The Colour Flash requires 2 x standard AA batteries, not included in the package.

name: Holga 120 TLR
description:
The Holga 120 TLR is a Twin Lens Reflex version of the Holga. It has two lenses - one for capturing the photo onto film, and the other as a viewfinder for framing the photo. The main advantage is that while you can compose your shots normally from the rear viewfinder, you can also compose your shots from above - meaning you can easily take candid, waist level shots without the guess work! In addition to that, the Holga 120TLR also sports a built-in Colour Flash for wonderful night time shots! Package includes:
  • Brand new Holga 120TLR camera
  • Film mask for 6 x 4.5cm shooting
  • Film mask for 6 x 6 cm shooting
  • Instruction manual
  • Camera strap
Note: The flash requires 2 x AA batteries, not included in the package.

name: Holga 120 PC Pinhole Camera
description:
The Holga 120 PC is the Pinhole version of the Holga 120 Series that lets you take photos with incredible depth of field. Instead of a standard lens, pictures are taken through a tiny pinhole - this allows almost an endless depth of field meaning everything in the picture is similar in focus. It comes with all the goodies the Holga has to offer, such as:
  • Bulb setting - allows for extended shutter release, ideal for use when shooting at night time or with a tripod
  • multiple exposures - allows you to shoot many photos onto a single frame/picture!
  • two film masks that give you the option to shoot 12 frames or 16 frames on a roll of 120 film!
How you make use of these features to create your photos is only limited by your imagination and creativity! Package includes:
  • Brand new Holga 120PC camera
  • Film mask for 6 x 4.5cm shooting
  • Film mask for 6 x 6 cm shooting
  • Instruction manual
  • Camera strap

name: Holga 120 WPC - Wide Pinhole Camera
description:
The Holga 120 WPC is the Wide Pinhole version of the Holga 120 series that lets you take panoramic photos with incredible depth of field. Instead of a standard lens, pictures are taken through a tiny pinhole - this allows almost an endless depth of field meaning everything in the picture is similar in focus. The Holga 120 WPC captures 6x9 images which are 50% wider than a regular Holga 120 Series camera. Create dreamy, soft focused pictures in a unique panoramic format! Package includes:
  • Brand new Holga 120WPC camera
  • Film mask for 6 x 9cm shooting
  • Instruction manual
  • Camera strap

name: Holga 120 PAN
description:
The PAN in Holga 120 PAN stands for panoramic, this being the latest camera that Holga have put out that captures close to 180 degrees of view. This camera is similar to the Holga 120 WPC but instead of the pinhole it packs a 90mm optical lens, two hotshoes and a bubble level indicator. This camera is truly a dime especially if you are into landscape photography. This camera shoots up to six photos on one roll of 120 film using the 6x12cm mask provided. Specifications
  • Lens Type: 90mm Optical
  • Focus Mode: Adjustable / Zone Focus (Portrait/Small Group/Big Group/Infinity)
  • Flash: 2 x Standard Hotshoe
  • Native Film Format: 120 Medium Format
  • Tripod Mount: Yes
  • Bulb (Long) Exposure: Yes
  • Dimensions: 205x117x107mm
  • Weight: 250g
  • Accessories Included: 1 Take Up Spool, and 1 Strap

name: Holga 135 PC Pinhole Camera
description:
The Holga 135 PC is the Pinhole version of the Holga 135 series that takes standard 35mm film however it has also uses a pinhole lens allowing you to achieve incredible depth of field. Like the Holga 120PC, instead of a standard lens, pictures are taken through a tiny pinhole which allows almost an endless depth of field - meaning everything in the picture is similar in focus. It has a permanent Bulb setting so you can control the length of the exposure for each frame you take. This allows you to create extremely dreamy pictures with maximum soft focus effect characteristic of Holgas! Package includes:
  • Brand new Holga 135PC camera
  • Instruction manual
  • Camera strap

name: Holga 135 DIY Camera Kit
description: Want to know how a camera works? What better way to learn than to build one yourself! This kit contains all parts of a fully functional 35mm film camera and a step by step guide to show you how all the different parts of a camera work together to take a picture.

name: Holga 120 35mm Film Adapter
description:
This 35mm Film Adapter empowers your Holga 120 Series camera to use regular 35mm film instead of 120 film! The kit comes with instructions of how you can turn your 120 camera to be able to shoot to 35 mm film. With the exception of the 120 WPC, it is compatible with the all other Holga 120's on our site! Package includes:
  • 135 Film Adapter Kit
  • 135 Adapter Back Cover
  • Instruction manual
Note: There are a few limitations to the Holga 120-35mm Film adapter, namely that it does not have a rewind film function (you must take the film out in the dark and rewind it yourself), it does not have a film counter (you need to use it's guideline to count how many clicks to wind to the next frame) and it does not shoot onto sprockets of 35mm film. If these functions are important to you than you may consider getting the improved version of the 120 to 35mm Film adapter made by Superheadz, also available in our store here.

name: Superheadz Holga 120 to 35mm Adapter
description:
The Superheadz Holga 35mm adapter is Superheadz's version of the 35mm adapter, designed for use with cameras in Holga 120's range (N, CFN, GCFN and PC to name the few) The price difference between this and the standard Holga 120 to 35mm adapter comes with a reason:
  • There is a frame counter - No more guesswork required as to how much you need to advance... the frames shoot close to spot on!
  • Film rewind - No need to get into a dark room as you would have to with the standard adapter, this offers the ability for you to rewind your film when you are done shooting
  • Shoot with or without sprockets - Probably the most appealing bit about this adapter is the ability to shoot onto sprockets. This means pictures are not limited by the standard rectangular 35mm format, but are visible even where the sprocket holes are!
  • It's plastic, but the construction is top notch - the whole unit fits very snug into the 120 body, you need not worry about it falling out just cos you give it a little bump when it's in your bag.
The question of whether you really need this comes down to how much you will be shooting your Holga 120 using 35mm. If you have a Holga 120, and have thought about getting a Holga 135, then yes, this is definitely for you as the 135 can not shoot onto sprockets. If you want the best of both worlds (120 and 35mm) then getting the Holga 120 and also having this handy sure beats the original adapter by a mile and will make your life a helluva lot easier!

name: Holga 12 MFC Colour Flash (Black)
description:
The Holga 12MFC is an external flash unit that is compatible for use with most 120 or 135 cameras that have an external hotshoe. The flash comes with 5 colour filters - red, yellow, blue, green and soft diffuse. This flash makes for a perfect addition to the Holga models without a Built-in Colour Flash. You can also attach this unit to any other film camera with a flash hotshoe to empower it with the same funky colour effects a Holga CFN Series has to offer! Package includes:
  • Holga 12MFC Flash Unit (Black)
  • Instruction manual
Also available in a White version Note: The flash requires 2 x standard AA batteries, not included in the package.

name: Holga 12 MFC Colour Flash (White)
description:

Also available in a Black version Note: The flash requires 2 x standard AA batteries, not included in the package.

name: Holga 135 BC Camera (Black)
description:
The Holga 135 BC lets you take dreamy images like the original Holga, however using regular 35mm film. It looks like a mini version of the 120 series, with all the same features including allowing multiple exposures on the same frame, two shutter settings, two aperture settings and all the characteristic photo effects of a Holga! The BC in the name stands for Black Corners, which means the cameras are manufactured to maximise the distinctive Holga vignetting effects! It also includes a flash hotshoe to allow you to attach any external flash for night time shots. (Hint: Combine the Holga 135 BC with the original Holga 12 MFC Colour Flash for funky colourful effects!) Package includes:
  • Brand new Holga 135BC camera (Black)
  • Instruction manual
  • Camera strap
The Holga 135BC is also available in other colors!

name: Holga 135 TIM
description: This camera is more than just a smiley face, although it's bound to put a smile on yours when it's in your hands and you're shooting it! The Holga 135 TIM is a half frame camera has two "eyes" which are really two lenses: it allows you to shoot half a frame with one eye open, or two half frames with both eyes open! The effect is pretty cool - you can easily do double exposures on half frames. The thing with a half frame camera is that you get double the amount of exposures on 35mm film as well (that's 72 shots on a roll of 36)!

name: Lomography Holga Starter Kit (Black)
description: The Lomography Holga Starter Kit is Lomography's take of the classic Holga 120 camera! Lomography have chosen to repackage the Holga 120 CFN along with a bunch of goodies like their very own soft cover booklet "The World through a Plastic Lens" - a colorful 306 page booklet of fun techniques, tricks and an awesome gallery of photos taken from the Holga! The book is bound to be a great starting point for creative inspiration to both new and existing Holga users! The main centrepiece of the package being the black Holga 120 CFN, is the Holga 120 with a built-in color flash. Operating the Colour Flash is as easy as rotating the dial at the top of the camera. In addition to a normal white flash, red, blue and orange coloured flashes are also available at your disposal! We will also throw in two free rolls of 120 film with this package to get you well on your way! This package is ideal for beginners to Holga looking for a no-fuss easy start and the packaging made my Lomography makes it an ideal gift for others!

name: Lomography Spinner 360
description:
The Lomography Spinner 360 is really a one of a kind camera! With a pull of the cord, the Spinner will capture a 360 picture onto film as it spins around its own axis by recording everything on a frame more than 4 times longer than a conventional landscape picture using 35mm film.

Pull the ripcord to send the camera into a complete spin, capturing the full panoramic scope of your eye's view, plus yourself and everything behind you. (This is the only camera that will almost always get the photographer in the photo!)

A sturdy handle and a level that sits atop the camera will keep your shot straight.

Or experiment by tilting, or manually controlling the exposure with the ripcord. Just release slowly for a longer exposure.

The effects and pictures you can capture using this camera are nothing short of awesome!

name: Lomography Sprocket Rocket
description:
As the name of the camera itself suggests, the Lomography Sprocket Rocket's design was made specifically to capture images higher than the standard 35mm film size such that the image goes right onto the sprockets themselves! This effect can usually be done using a converter or a DIY job on Holga or Diana cameras but no modification is required on this camera! In addition to that this camera packs a number of additional nifty features:
  • Film can be advanced or rewinded any time giving you the additional creativity choices for multiple exposures
  • Uses all types of standard 35mm film.
  • Super-wide angle lens that captures the whole width of the film, including sprockets!
  • B-setting for long exposures.
  • Zone-focusing.
  • Hot-shoe for flash and built-in standard tripod thread

name: Lomography Diana F+ (camera only)
description:
The Lomography Diana camera is without a doubt one of Lomography's most well-known cameras and it's not hard to see why! The Diana camera has a history that dates back to the 1960s (that's even earlier than Holga!). Like the Holga, it's built up a cult legend for being famous for its dreamy, radiant lo-fi images. Today's Diana cameras come with the original look - it's retro design and the eye-catching flash that comes with it is guaranteed to attract attention from even non-photography enthusiasts! The Diana F+ is a medium format camera. This means it takes 120 film (similar to the Holga 120 series of cameras). Please note: this package does not come with a flash - although it is flash capable meaning you can add a Diana flash to it later on if you wish. If you wish to purchase it with a flash then check out our other listings which have flashes such as our Lomography Diana F+ (with flash) listing. The Diana F+ comes packed with features:
  • Two shutter speeds - "N" for normal (1/60 shutter speed) or B for long exposures (indoor/nighttime)
  • Three aperture settings - f/11, f/16, and f/22!
  • Two image formats - shoot 12 full frame shots or 16 on a roll of 120 medium format film!
  • Multi-exposures - allows you to add another dimension in creativity to your photos
  • Removable lens for Pinhole Function - a "Pinhole" setting puts the aperture to f/150!
  • Shutter Lock and Tripod Thread for solid long exposures and pinhole photography
  • Plastic Lens - f/16, 75mm lens
Each package includes the new "Diana Vignettes, More True Tales & Short Stories" book - packed with over 200 pages of Diana history, Diana+ images, and truly off-the-wall fictional stories. Package Includes:
  • Diana F+ Camera
  • "More True Tales & Short Stories" Diana Vignettes hardcover book
  • 12 & 16-shot format frames
  • neckstrap, lens cap
  • Multilingual instructions book

name: Lomography Diana F+ (with Flash)
description:
The Lomography Diana camera is without a doubt one of Lomography's most well-known cameras and it's not hard to see why! The Diana camera has a history that dates back to the 1960s (that's even earlier than Holga!). Like the Holga, it's built up a cult legend for being famous for its dreamy, radiant lo-fi images. Today's Diana cameras come with the original look - it's retro design and the eye-catching flash that comes with it is guaranteed to attract attention from even non-photography enthusiasts! The Diana F+ is a medium format camera. This means it takes 120 film (similar to the Holga 120 series of cameras). The flash included in this package fires a burst of white or colored light at your subject. Included adapters allow you to use the Diana Flash on standard hotshoe cameras (like the LC-A+ and Fisheye 2) or use a hotshoe flash on Diana F+ body. The Diana F+ comes packed with features:
  • Two shutter speeds - "N" for normal (1/60 shutter speed) or B for long exposures (indoor/nighttime)
  • Three aperture settings - f/11, f/16, and f/22!
  • Two image formats - shoot 12 full frame shots or 16 on a roll of 120 medium format film!
  • Multi-exposures - allows you to add another dimension in creativity to your photos
  • Removable lens for Pinhole Function - a "Pinhole" setting puts the aperture to f/150!
  • Shutter Lock and Tripod Thread for solid long exposures and pinhole photography
  • Plastic Lens - f/16, 75mm lens
Each package includes the new "Diana Vignettes, More True Tales & Short Stories" book - packed with over 200 pages of Diana history, Diana+ images, and truly off-the-wall fictional stories. Package Includes:
  • Diana F+ Camera
  • Diana F+ Flash
  • "More True Tales & Short Stories" Diana Vignettes hardcover book
  • Color Gel Filters - allows you to add color to your flash
  • 12 & 16-shot format frames
  • Shutter lock, neckstrap, lens cap
  • Multilingual instructions

name: Lomography Diana F+ Hong Meow (with Flash)
description:
The Lomography Diana F+ Hong Meow is a special edition Diana F+ camera. It's packed with all the original's features but with a white and black color scheme and design! With this design, the Diana F+ has a new black and white costume that resembles the look of a giant panda (that's where the Hong Meow name originates from), with subtle details on the camera like different graphics on the focusing ring, winding knob, as well as a green neck strap! The Lomography Diana camera is without a doubt one of Lomography's most well-known cameras and it's not hard to see why! The Diana camera has a history that dates back to the 1960s (that's even earlier than Holga!). Like the Holga, it's built up a cult legend for being famous for its dreamy, radiant lo-fi images. Today's Diana cameras come with the original look - it's retro design and the eye-catching flash that comes with it is guaranteed to attract attention from even non-photography enthusiasts! The Diana F+ is a medium format camera. This means it takes 120 film (similar to the Holga 120 series of cameras). The flash included in this package fires a burst of white or colored light at your subject. Included adapters allow you to use the Diana Flash on standard hotshoe cameras (like the LC-A+ and Fisheye 2) or use a hotshoe flash on Diana F+ body. The Diana F+ comes packed with features:
  • Two shutter speeds - "N" for normal (1/60 shutter speed) or B for long exposures (indoor/nighttime)
  • Three aperture settings - f/11, f/16, and f/22!
  • Two image formats - shoot 12 full frame shots or 16 on a roll of 120 medium format film!
  • Multi-exposures - allows you to add another dimension in creativity to your photos
  • Removable lens for Pinhole Function - a "Pinhole" setting puts the aperture to f/150!
  • Shutter Lock and Tripod Thread for solid long exposures and pinhole photography
  • Plastic Lens - f/16, 75mm lens
Each package includes the new "Diana Vignettes, More True Tales & Short Stories" book - packed with over 200 pages of Diana history, Diana+ images, and truly off-the-wall fictional stories. Package Includes:
  • Diana F+ Camera
  • Diana F+ Flash
  • "More True Tales & Short Stories" Diana Vignettes hardcover book
  • Color Gel Filters - allows you to add color to your flash
  • 12 & 16-shot format frames
  • Shutter lock, neckstrap, lens cap
  • Multilingual instructions

name: Lomography Diana Mini
description:
The Diana Mini looks like a shrunken (or should we just say mini?) version of the Lomography Diana F+ - the size difference comes about because this camera takes in 35mm film! As 35mm is not as wide in height as the medium format 120 film that the Diana F+ takes, this camera is able to be much more compact in design! Don't be fooled into thinking that smaller design means less features - Lomography have done a great job in packing features into this little beast! With the flick of a switch you can move from the standard 35mm format to the amazing Half-Frame, giving you the ability to shoot 72 shots onto a standard roll of 35mm film - thats 72 rectangular half-frames or 36 full frame images on one roll! As well as that, just like the Diana F+, this Diana Mini comes packed with features:
  • Two shutter speeds - "N" for normal (1/60 shutter speed) or B for long exposures (indoor/nighttime)
  • Two aperture settings - f/8 and f/11
  • 1/60 shutter speed
  • Pocket-sized and ultra-compact
  • Uses convenient 35mm film
  • Allows you to shoot 72 rectangular half-frames or 36 square pictures on one 35mm roll!
  • Multi-exposures - allows you to add another dimension in creativity to your photos
  • Tripod thread and cable release thread
  • 0.6m to infinity focus - for a plastic point and shoot 0.6 is damn close!
The Diana mini offers full compatibility with the Diana Flash (same one used by the Diana F+)! Package Includes:
  • Diana Mini Camera
  • Carrying Strap
  • Lens Cap
  • 'Shoot Forever' Diana Mini Book
  • Instruction Manual

name: Lomography SuperSampler (Black)
description:
The SuperSampler is similar to the ActionSampler (hence the name!) however instead of four squared tiled layout, the lenses are laid out in sequence horizontal, with each taking vertical shots onto a standard 35mm frame! The four wide angle lenses produce an effect that is just absolutely downright cool and trippy! Even photos of inanimate objects will come to life by simply composing a sequence of pictures at different angles! SuperSampler Features:
  • Patented quick rip-cord for easy film advance
  • Two time span modes between exposures: 4 exposures in 2 seconds and 4 exposures in 0.2 seconds
  • 4 x 24mm lenses
  • 1/100 sec fixed exposure
Package includes:
  • SuperSampler in black
  • rubber viewfinder guide
  • one roll 35mm film
  • 144-page color photo book
  • instruction manual

name: Lomography ActionSampler
description:
The ActionSampler is a small and handy lightweight camera snaps a series of four images with a 0.22 second delay between each shot. That means it's got four separate small wideangle lenses and flywheel for a shutter. The idea is simple, but the effects are awesome! It's ideal and super effective especially when shooting action shots of moving things. The four images produced on a single 35mm frame will show up in a time lapse effect! Package includes:
  • Actionsampler camera
  • Wrist strap
  • Full manuals in English

name: Lomography Fisheye (Woodgrain)
description:
This original Lomography Fisheye camera sparked a craze when it was first released. It's unique design coupled with the wacky fisheye pictures produced made it an instant hit for Lomography. This 35mm camera with a built-in fisheye lens lets your take pictures with a sweeping 170-degree view compacting everything around you into a compact circular image. With this camera, you can literally get up as close as a subject's nose! It's huge depth of field renders both the foreground and background in complete focus. Its premium glass lens offers bright colors and knockout contrast. Rocks a built-in electronic flash for use day or night. Features:
  • 170-degree fisheye lens
  • Built-in electronic flash
  • Flex lens cap and strap
  • Poster, "Fisheye View" mini photo book, instruction manual
Note: Flash requires one AA battery, not included.

name: Lomography Fisheye No.2 (Black)
description:
With the blistering continued success of the original Lomography Fisheye and the warm reception worldwide, Lomography soon announced plans to come up with an updated version. This is how the Lomography Fisheye no.2 came about. Packed with all the original features, the Fisheye No. 2 adds a bulb setting for long exposures, a switch for multiple exposures on the same frame, the ability to fire both a hot shoe flash and the built-in flash, a true fisheye viewfinder, and a "full metal jacket" body treatment. All these new functions provide you with so many more choices to consider in adding some flare to your lomo photos. Features Include:
  • 170 degree fisheye lens
  • On-camera flash
  • Hot shoe mount for external flash
  • Multiple-expose switch for easy double-exposed images
  • "Bulb" setting for long exposures
  • "Lock" setting so the shutter won't fire in your bag
  • Flex lens cap and strap
  • Poster, "Fisheye View" mini photo book, and instruction manual
Note: Built-in flash requires one AA battery, not included.

name: Holga 120 Fisheye Adapter
description:
Convert your Holga 120 Series camera into a Fisheye camera! The Fisheye adapter allows you to take stunning and quirky fisheye photos with extremely wide angles giving a unique, distorted look! Add a whole new dimension to your photos with this small accessory that can be attached or detached conveniently for different situations! This accessory fits neatly over the standard 120 lens, so it is compatible with the Holga 120N and Holga 120CFN we have on on our site! Package includes:
  • 120 Fisheye Lens
  • Front and back lens cap
  • Lens pouch

name: Holga 120 Fisheye Viewfinder
description:
This 120 fisheye viewfinder goes hand in hand with the 120 Fisheye lens, and you guessed it, it's for the Holga 120 line of cameras!

When you use the Fisheye lens on the Holga, you don't get to frame your picture properly using the standard viewfinder however this accessory allows you to do just that!

It slots neatly into the hotshoe compartment, and instantly allows you to see the fisheye view - saving you any guess work and allowing you to compose your pictures much easier!

name: Holga 135 Fisheye Adapter
description:
Convert your Holga 135 Series camera into a Fisheye camera! The Fisheye adapter allows you to take stunning and quirky fisheye photos with extremely wide angles giving a unique, distorted look! Add a whole new dimension to your photos with this small accessory that can be attached or detached conveniently for different situations! This accessory fits neatly over the standard 135 so it's compatible with the Holga 135 BC, and Holga 135 PC Package includes:
  • 135 Fisheye Lens
  • Front and back lens cap
  • Lens pouch

name: Holga 135 Fisheye Viewfinder
description:
This 135 fisheye viewfinder goes hand in hand with the 135 Fisheye lens, and you guessed it, it's for the Holga 135 line of cameras!

When you use the Fisheye lens on the Holga, you don't get to frame your picture properly using the standard viewfinder however this accessory allows you to do just that!

It slots neatly into the hotshoe compartment, and instantly allows you to see the fisheye view - saving you any guess work and allowing you to compose your pictures much easier!

name: Holga Wide Lens
description:
Are you lacking a wide field of view? Looking to take better landscape shots? Then get the Holga wide angle lens and get more subject in your photo than you can shake a stick at.

This is a simple push on lens attachment that fits very well over top of the existing twist lens on all standard Holgas (120 & 135!) with twist barrel lenses. 

This attachment will not impede focusing, and easily can be pushed on and taken off.

Comes with a nice carrying bag!

name: Holga Tele Lens
description:
The Holga Tele lens is another great lens that is compatible with both the 120 and 135 Holgas. It''s nifty design enables you to slot it right over the Holga lens.

With this lens on, the subjects that you shoot will have a magnified effect as the lens zooms in at 2.5x. You will find that with this lens the photos that you shoot will have an even larger amount of vignetting in them, not to mention that edges in the photos will become even dreamier than standard Holga shots.

It's one hell'uva fun lens to try out!

name: Holga Filter Set
description:
This Holga Filter Set will be bound to keep you busy and open up even more realms of creative possibilities for you to consider when composing shots. 

The package includes close to a dozen filters that slot into the filter adapter provided that is compatible with Holga lenses!

First off, the Soft Surround filters (blue, red, orange and grey) create a sharp center-focus hole in the middle of a blurry coloured image from the filter you select.

Next, solid colour filters (blue, red, yellow, orange) heighten the drama of your b&w images or tint your colour shots.

Finally, Split-image filters give off those crazily beautiful kaleidoscope-like images. Its time to add a new arsenal to your already feature-laden Holga!

name: Holga Colour Gradation Filter Set
description:
Are you looking to add a little flavour or spice to your Holga pictures? 

This set of gradation filters allows you to add some colorful tones to your liking. It is especially useful in allowing you to be creative as the color tones fade in and out from one side to the other.

It's ideal for shooting photos such as scenery or landscape pictures of the sunrise or sunset!

Note: You need a Holga Filter mounter in order to use this

name: Holga Lens for Canon (HL-C) SLR/DSLRs
description: Holga have come out with a lens especially designed for Canon SLR and dSlR's! Forget for a minute about thousand dollar lenses and pop one of these plastic Holga Lenses onto your Canon SLR and you'll likely be amazed at just how good images can be even when shot from a cheap plastic lens! The effective aperture of the lens is f/8 and focal length roughly equivalent to 60mm. Focus is achieved through the regular Holga Zone Focus method. Note this product has been redesigned as of March 2011 with an increased level of 'Holga-ness'. This is the version we now have in stock. Also enables the use of any regular Holga lens accessories once the adaptor is installed. Grab a Holga Lens for your Canon SLR today!

name: Superheadz Digital Harinezumi 2+++ Camera
description: The Superheadz Digital Harinezumi 2+++ is a compact, palm-sized mini digital camera designed to take digital photos and videos, with the typical lens flare, vignetting and all that lofi goodness. With the Zumi 2+++ you can choose between the pop-up viewfinder, or the LCD screen to compose your shots. Packed with 10 built-in colour modes, you can experiment with different colour tones from vibrant reds to vintange sepia. Also included is a very cool video mode that enables you to take vintage 8mm style movies! The Superheadz Digital Harinezumi 2+++ takes MicroSD cards (up to 16gb). A free 2gb MicroSD card is included in this package so you can get started snapping as soon as possible!

name: Superheadz Necono Digital Camera
description:
Designed by famous Swedish ceramist Lisa Larson, the Necono camera is an amusing little digital camera in the shape of a cat! This cute, compact camera takes a MicroSD card (up to 16gb) to allow you to take photos and videos in vivid colour or black & white - lofi style.

There's so much to like about Necono - the camera lens is disguised in the left eye, with the right eye being the sensor, and the shutter button on the body! With magnets integrated at its feet, the Necono can stick to any magnetic surface, acting as a tripod which gives you the freedom to take self-timer portraits, time-lapse videos or movies!

A free 2gb MicroSD card is included in this package so you can get started snapping as soon as possible!

name: Superheadz CLAP Digital Camera - Black
description:
The Superheadz CLAP in Black is a stylish, mini-sized digital camera with built-in USB rechargeable battery and functionality! Weighing only 24g with a size similar to a regular USB thumb drive, it is capable of taking both digital photos and videos.

Just pop in a MicroSD card (up to 16GB in size) and you have with you a 2megapixel camera and USB thumb drive in one!

A free 2gb MicroSD card is included in this package so you can get started snapping as soon as possible!

The CLAP is also available in White, Orange and Blue.

name: Superheadz Golden Half
description:
The Superheadz Golden Half is a half frame camera that takes normal 35mm black & white or color film. The name "Golden Half" comes from the fact that this camera takes only half a frame from a full frame - this means that you get double the amount of pictures from the same roll! Meaning: 72 pictures from a roll of 36, 48 from a roll of 24! Take advantage of doubling the fun in a roll of film, or expand your creativity by taking two pictures side by side ('diptyches') to tell a different story! What we also love about this camera is the size and weight. It weighs only 90g! It's dimensions are 88x72x32mm - it can easily fit in the palm of your hand and comfortably placed into your jean pockets. Check out the Golden Half next to the free box of 35mm film that comes with the box and get an idea of how small it is! Features we LOVE about this camera:
  • Size and Weight - It makes it an ideal camera to take with you for all outdoor occasions
  • External Hotshoe - Allows you to attach a flash unit making it ideal for indoor occassions as well!
  • 22mm Wide angle lens - A Wide angle lens is a must for half frame cameras and the Golden Half has the widest out of all the toy camera half frame cameras!
  • Half frame camera - 72 shots out of a roll of 36 is just awesome!
  • Two aperture settings - f/8 and f/11
  • Focus: 1.5m to infinity

name: Superheadz Black Slim Devil
description:
The Superheadz Black Slim Devil is a remake of the cult classic Vivitar Ultra Wide and Slim camera, that created a huge following for it's ability to create photos similar to that of the world-famous Lomo LC-A! It's an ideal camera to take with you for days out in the sun. Weighing in at only 75g with dimensions of 98 x 60mm (W x H), it's ultra light weight construction and dimensions is ideal to have it slipped in your jeans pockets to carry with you for any occasion! You will love the photos that are produced with the wide angle lens of this camera! The wide angle lens (22mm) that comes with this highly portable camera packs a lot of punch with the surprisingly vivid vignetted photos it can produce. These cameras take normal 35mm black and white or color film. Features we LOVE about this camera:
  • Size and Weight - It makes it an ideal camera to take with you for all outdoor occasions
  • 22mm Wide angle lens - shoot dynamic, wide pictures with this wide angle lens
  • Shutter speed: 1/125
  • Aperture F11

name: Superheadz Blackbird Fly TLR (White)
description:
The Superheadz Blackbird Fly TLR is like the gran-daddy of TLR's as far as toy camera TLR's are concerned. The Blackbird Fly is sometimes known simply as BBF. Compared to the other toy camera TLR's on the market right now, we have to admit, this one is pricey. But there's a lot of reasons for this. First off, the construction is solid. When you hold it in your hands, you'll understand that it's not your like your average plastic toy camera. It's many degrees ahead in this respect in comparison to cameras like the Recesky or Gakkenflex, but the difference comes with the price. In addition to this, we'll let the features of the camera speak for itself:
  • Two apertures - f/7 and f/11
  • Three formats on 35mm film! Probably the most exciting thing about this camera, you can shoot normal 35mm, square format, and large square format (YES that means onto 35mm sprockets!)
  • 1/125 Shutter speed or Bulb mode
  • Tripod mount
  • Flash hotshoe
  • Multiple exposures
  • 33mmm Wide Angle lens
If you haven't experienced shooting a TLR before, then this is certainly one of them to consider. If you like the Holga, then this offers everything a Holga can, plus some more!

name: Fujifilm Instax Mini 7s Camera (White)
description:
Keep instant photography alive! We believe there is nothing like the joy of seeing a photo appear right in front of your eyes. The Fuji Instax Mini Camera is a fun, easy to use point and shoot camera that allows you to capture photos that are developed and printed instantly. This camera also features an automatic flash so you can take sharp and clear pictures in every situation. This camera is so well trusted and known that Polaroid rebrands this camera! They rebrand it and call it the Polaroid 300! The Fujifilm Instax Mini 7s Camera shoots onto Fujfilm Instax Mini film - it's a pocket sized film that is superb for wallets and great for capturing and storing those special moments instead of keeping them on a hard disk somewhere only to be lost and forgotten! Package includes:
  • Fujifilm Instax Mini 7s Camera (White)
  • Wrist strap
  • Instruction manual
Also available in Cocoa color, and make sure you pick up a pack of Fujfilm Instax Mini film! Note: The flash requires 4 x standard AA batteries, not included in the package.

description:

description:

name: Fujifilm Instax Mini 25 Camera (White)
description:
The Fujifilm Instax Mini 25 is a compact, instant film camera that you'll want to take everywhere. Simple operation makes this point-and-click camera great for parties, art projects, or anywhere you'd like to take instant photos.

The camera produces near-instant, vivid, high-quality credit card size prints. The camera has an LCD film counter and shooting mode display. 

The automatic electronic flash allows you to capture the perfect photo even in low light.

The Fujifilm Instax Mini 25 lets you shoot and share amazing pictures with ease. Additional fun features include a close-up lens, and mirror for self portraits.

Compared to the Mini 7s camera that we also sell, this one is slightly smaller and also weighs less as it takes two CR2 batteries (instead of 4 AA batteries). It's also got an adorable curvature design and it's sure to make the holder of the camera the centrepiece of attraction when you bring it to any event!

name: Fujifilm Instax Mini 50s Camera (Piano Black)
description: The Fujifilm Instax Mini 50s is another instant camera in Fujifilm's collection of cameras that utilises their lovable credit-card sized Fujifilm Instax Mini Film! The Fujifilm Instax Mini 50s camera comes in a sexy glossy black finish which is where the term "Piano Black" is coined from! This attractive body has a lens that electronically extends and retracts at a touch of the switch and it also comes with some features not available with it's predecessors like the 7s and 25s. The camera features an "intelligent" auto flash that flashes and illuminates backgrounds so that your subjects are not washed out by the flash. The self-timer features also adds the ability of a "2-shot" mode allowing you two shots with one click of the button. Similar to the 25s, the Instax Mini 50s adjusts shutter speeds incrementally, and comes with a close-up lens that allows you to shoot right up to 30 cm, for a 2:1 magnification ratio. At only 2 inches thickness and utilising two CR2 batteries, this camera's size, weight and sleek and attractive design makes it one of Fujifilm's most desirable cameras yet in its line of instant cameras! It features an electronic display that will show you what shooting options you have selected as well as a film counter. If you haven't stepped in and had a taste of the fun you can get out of Fujifilm's line of instant mini cameras yet... we think this one may just be the one that does it for you!

name: Fujifilm Instax Mini Color Film (10 photos)
description:
Restock on your Instant Film supply to expand your photo wall or album! Bring a few packs with you for any event to capture those memorable moments and watch the photos you shoot develop and appear instantly before your eyes! Fujifilm Instax Mini film is used for the Fujifilm Instax Camera range. One pack of film shoots ten instant photos! Note: This film works on the Polaroid 300 camera as well. The Polaroid 300 is a rebranded Fujifilm Instax Mini 7s camera. This means that Polaroid 300 film works on the Fujifilm Instax Mini range of cameras, and vice versa, Fujifilm Instax Mini film also works on the Polaroid 300 camera. Package includes:
  • Fujifilm Instax Mini pack (one pack has 10 shots)

name: Fujifilm Instax Mini Color Film (twin pack)
description:

  • Fujifilm Instax Mini TWIN pack (two packs of ten shots, total 20 shots)

name: Fujifilm Instax Mini Photo Album
description:
This gorgeous mini photo album is especially designed for Fujifilm Instax Mini films!

It's calendar style layout allows you to slip in many Instax Mini film shots using  the many pages of photo slips. It's design is extremely suitable for desktops or decoration surfaces where a normal photo or portrait frame may sit. 

It makes as a perfect companion for a gift, or just when you find yourself having shot way too many instax mini shots that you need something to store the ones you treasure the most into!

name: Fujifilm Instax Mini Camera Carry Bag - Black
description:
Protect your Fujifilm instax Mini Camera with this carry bag in Black! 

The bag is made to fit all models of the Fujifilm Instax Mini Camera range including the Instax Mini 7s, Instax Mini 25 and Instax Mini 50s in our store.
